suite.name: ProductFilterTest

kw.name: Validate the functionality of filter options
Evaluate
kw.doc: Evaluates the given expression in Python and returns the result.

kw.name: Call Method
kw.doc: Calls the named method of the given object with the provided arguments.

kw.name: Create Webdriver
kw.msg: Creating an instance of the Chrome WebDriver.
kw.doc: Creates an instance of Selenium WebDriver.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Set Selenium Implicit Wait
kw.doc: Sets the implicit wait value used by Selenium.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Password
kw.msg: Temporally setting log level to: NONE
kw.doc: Types the given password into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Select From List By Label
kw.msg: Selecting options from selection list 'css:.product_sort_container' by label Name (A to Z).
kw.doc: Selects options from selection list ``locator`` by ``labels``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
Create List
kw.doc: Returns a list containing given items.

kw.name: Get WebElements
kw.doc: Returns a list of WebElement objects matching the ``locator``.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Append To List
kw.doc: Adds ``values`` to the end of ``list``.

kw.name: Set Test Variable
kw.msg: ${actual_list} = ['Sauce Labs Backpack', 'Sauce Labs Bike Light', 'Sauce Labs Bolt T-Shirt', 'Sauce Labs Fleece Jacket', 'Sauce Labs Onesie', 'Test.allTheThings() T-Shirt (Red)']
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current test.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.
Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Check the products are sorted according to the filter
Split String
kw.msg: ${expected_list} = ['Sauce Labs Backpack', 'Sauce Labs Bike Light', 'Sauce Labs Bolt T-Shirt', 'Sauce Labs Fleece Jacket', 'Sauce Labs Onesie', 'Test.allTheThings() T-Shirt (Red)']
kw.doc: Splits the ``string`` using ``separator`` as a delimiter string.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Return Status
Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.
Runs the given keyword with given arguments and returns the status as a Boolean value.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Lists Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if given lists are unequal.
Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

kw.arg: Sauce Labs Backpack,Sauce Labs Bike Light,Sauce Labs Bolt T-Shirt,Sauce Labs Fleece Jacket,Sauce Labs Onesie,Test.allTheThings() T-Shirt (Red)
